By acting confidently, I aim to create an atmosphere of pressure and uncertainty, which may prompt Christian to make a mistake or reveal their true intentions.
play_history.behavior: Anika confidently plays two cards with a hint of calculated risk-taking, aiming to provoke Christian into revealing their hand
play_history.challenge_reason: Given Anika's impulsive and overconfident nature, this presents an opportunity to exploit her risk-taking behavior. By challenging her claim, it may lead her to underestimate potential counter-strategies or overlook strategic bluffs. This move could potentially expose her hand or force her into a disadvantageous position in future rounds.
